translation.en: Whoa!
All the food's gonna go bad.
Yeah, I drew up a list. I'll hit the store before it gets all bought out.

Can you save it?
No, no way.
No, I gotta start over from scratch.
I'll call the studio when the phones get back up, see if they can extend my deadline. Ah.

They could whip up some bad Photoshop poster in an afternoon,

translation.en: they do it all the time, two big heads.

translation.en: Well, sweetie, you couldn't exactly know
translation.ja: 絵を置いたままの僕がバカだったよ まさか木が窓を破るなんて

translation.en: that a tree was gonna come flying through the window.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll hit the hardware store too, get some plastic sheeting and duct tape and seal this up before it gets dark, you know.

translation.en: Order in some new glass.

translation.en: Holy crap!
Billy!
Sorry, Mom, but you just gotta come, come on.

-Whoa. -Whoa.
Having spoken, the Doomsayer departs.

You have incredibly low standards. Mhm.
All right, let's go see the damage.

translation.en: No!
Norton's tree. Yeah.
You mean the dead one I've been asking him to take down for three years before it finally blew over? That tree?

translation.en: It really got smushed.
You ain't kiddin'.
Look at that.
[Billy] What is it, Daddy?
Mist?
On the lake?
We've had mist on the lake before.
Coming off the mountain like that?
Two fronts meeting, leftover from the storm?
translation.ja: ２つの前線が—— ぶつかって起きた現象さ

translation.en: Something like that?

translation.en: You sure?
Honey, I'm not the weatherman. Why don't you take Billy, get him dressed, I'll take him to town with me.

I'm gonna go have a little chat with our neighbor about his tree.

translation.en: Hon.
Don't worry, I'm not gonna punch him in the nose.
You know what he's gonna say. He's gonna say "Sue me," which, I don't know, maybe we should.

translation.en: I'm gonna ask for his insurance information.

translation.en: Okay.
Yeah.
[Mr. Norton] Motherfucker!
Aw, shit!
Oh, you motherfucker!
Cock sucker!
Turn on, full choke, pull five choke.

translation.en: I guess you've seen the...
Boathouse.
Yeah, and?
Just think we should trade insurance info, you know?

translation.en: That's all.
Oh, my insurance guy's gonna love me.
I was gonna bring the station wagon, but, I don't know,
the weather was so beautiful coming out of New York, I just... You know, top down.

translation.en: I'm sorry, man, I mean it. Sincerely.

translation.en: That's nice of you to say.
No, that car was cherry, I hate to see it like that.

translation.en: Okay, I'll tell you what. I'll find my insurance guy's number, I'll bring it by later.

translation.en: Is that okay?
No problem.
So, David.
You're not heading into town today by any chance, are you?

One for the books, yeah.
For a moment there last night I thought we were gonna take off and head for Oz.

Guys from the base.
From up the mountain?
The Arrowhead Project?
Well, you're a local. Any idea what they do up there?

translation.en: Missile defense research, you know, I'm sure you've heard the stories.

translation.en: Oh, sure. The woman at the laundromat says that
they have a crashed flying saucer up there with frozen alien bodies.

translation.en: Right, Miss Edna, yeah. Miss Tabloid.

translation.en: "I Had Bigfoot's Baby".
"Satan's Face Appears in Oil Well Fire". You know, real reliable stuff.

Maybe their power's out too.
Ah, still no signal.
Why don't you go ahead? I'm gonna try Steph on the payphone.

translation.en: Sure, if you promise to hold his hand, I guess. [Billy] Yeah?

translation.en: Here's a list. -Okay. -Okay? Meet you guys in there.

translation.en: Hold hands.
Sally, hey.
You guys look jammed up.
Yeah, well, half the staff didn't show, plus the power's out.

Only to keep the food cold. Everything else, welcome to the Dark Ages and bring your checkbook.

translation.en: Heck yeah, I'm there.
[David] Oh my God.
[Ollie] The storm. Everybody's stocking up, been like this since we opened.

translation.en: Crappy day, huh?
Eh, everyone's a little pissed off this morning.
Morning, Mrs. Carmody.
[Mrs. Carmody] With lines like these, I don't know how good it is,

translation.en: but I guess we'll have to make do.

translation.en: Keep your head down, pal.
I know it.
Hey, champ.
Your wife should be a doctor. She could make a fortune in Manhattan with this handwriting.

translation.en: Yeah, it takes some getting used to.

translation.en: I'll meet you at the checkout.
Okay, done.
Hey, David. Thanks for helping me out today.

translation.en: Oh, I don't know.
Friends might be stretching it a little.
Guess you're not mad at each other anymore.

translation.en: I guess not.
Hey, and that's a start, eh?
[Man] I'm sorry, ma'am, the register's down.
[Officer Jessup] The bus leaves in 30 minutes.
We'll make it, okay?
You guys get the goodies, I'll wait in line.
[Jessup] Good morning, Ms. Reppler.
[Billy] Hello, Ms. Reppler.
Well, hello to you, Billy Drayton.
How'd you hold up in the storm?
We had a tree come through the picture window last night, right in my studio.

translation.en: And the boathouse got all smushed. Mr. Norton's tree fell on it.

translation.en: Sorry to hear that.

translation.en: you'd think educating children would be more of a priority in this country,

translation.en: but you'd be wrong.
Government's got better things to spend our money on,

I'm sure she's fine. Don't worry, okay?

[Donaldson] Oh, come on, we'v got 10 days leave. Check our papers.
[M.P. Officer] Look, I told you all leaves are canceled. I don't know why.

You men meet me back at the jeep in 5 minutes.
That's an order.
[Morales] Shit, man. Another half an hour, we'd of been gone.

[Dan] Something in the mist!
Something in the mist took John Lee!

translation.en: Dan, catch your breath!
Something in the mist took John Lee. I could hear him screaming.

[Dan] Don't go out there. There's something in the mist, it took John Lee!

Please hold me.
It's okay, it's okay.

What's going on?
It's death.
[Mike] That was an earthquake.
[Ambrose] I tell ya, the goddamn mills blew up!

Didn't you hear that man screaming?
I agree, let's stay here until we figure it out.

translation.en: You're not listening! I can't stay here.

translation.en: Sometimes she forgets she's supposed to be watching him, you know?

For their sakes, don't.

translation.en: Won't somebody here see a lady home?

translation.en: You?
You?
Ma'am, please.
I got my own boy to worry about.
I hope you all rot in hell.

translation.en: [Ollie] Ma'am, please, wait until...

Get the spilled bottles, broken glass, stuff like that.

translation.en: Aisle 3 has medical supplies.
Easy champ, come on.

translation.en: You can't keep crying like this, pal.
You're gonna hurt yourself. Come on, you all right?

translation.en: I want Mommy. All right, I know you do.
Just try to breathe, okay?
Just try to breathe, pal, it's okay.
I haven't seen him suck his thumb like this since he was two years old.

translation.en: He's in shock. I think we all are.

translation.en: You haven't met. Amanda Dunfrey.

translation.en: She's new in town as of this semester.

translation.en: Teaches 3rd grade, and the special ed kids now that Mosher's retired.

translation.en: She's wonderful, the kids love her.

translation.en: And David's an artist, he does movie posters and such.

translation.en: Oh, and me.
Lord, I'm babbling away like some old biddy at a tea party.

translation.en: My nerves are jangled, I guess.
Boy settle down? How is he?

translation.en: Still hot.
[Amanda] Why don't I get him some aspirin? Aisle 3.
Okay. Thanks.
How's Dan?
Ah, his nose stopped bleeding. He's calmer now, somebody gave him a Valium.

translation.en: I can't believe the way he ran in here. Never seen him like that.

translation.en: Furniture pads, loading dock.

translation.en: Gonna keep checking on people, if you need anything, just holler.

translation.en: Sally, you mind?
Oh, I'd love to. I really should help him clean up.
I'll take him.
No, I'll be gone two seconds, Big Bill.

translation.en: Come on, I'm gonna get your blanket.

translation.en: I'll be close by, okay? Don't worry, I'm not far. Okay?

translation.en: Let me look at you.
[Hattie] Wanna lie Down?
[Nortan] As soon as it blows away we can walk out of here safe and free,

translation.en: but we have to be smarter.
The first thing we need to do is keep our wits about us and find out what's happening.

translation.en: God damn it!
Bitch!
[Nortan] It's obvious that we're in some kind of natural disaster here.

translation.en: [Biker] Ain't nothing obvious bout this sombitch from where I sit.
translation.ja: 何ひとつ明らかじゃない

translation.en: [Ambrose] There ain't nothing natural about it either.
[Biker] That's right.
[Mrs. Carmody] It's Judgment Day, and it's come round at last. There is nothing more obvious or natural than that.

translation.en: [Biker] Aw, fuck now.
You've done that to yourself by a life of sin and disillusion.

translation.en: Hey, you guys hear that?

translation.en: We're just gonna check it out.

translation.en: No, no, I turned the generator off, it was backing up.

translation.en: Nobody else heard that sound?
What sound?
I don't know, like a weird noise,
back there in the dark.

translation.en: Like something was pressing against the door.

translation.en: Did you hear it before the lights went out or after?

translation.en: No, only after.
After, but look, I heard it, okay?
Nobody's calling you a liar.
That's what it sounds like.
[Jim] No, no, no, no, now don't be that way, Mr. Drayton. [Jim] You had a scare, no doubt.

translation.en: Let's say we all go check it out. Here.
It's pretty rank in here. Myron, go check it out.

translation.en: [Jim] Go on, fire it up.
All right, turn it off!
[Myron] Holy crow, don't that stink.
Something's got the exhaust vent plugged up from the outside.

translation.en: [Norm] You get it running long enough to raise that door a little,
I'll go out and clear whatever's blocking it.
[David] No, no, you can't do that.
It's an electric door, right?

translation.en: [Ollie] Well, yeah, but it may not be wise to send him out there.
translation.ja: そうだが彼を行かせるのは…

translation.en: [Myron] Okay, I'll do it.
No, look, it's not about who goes out there-
translation.ja: 誰にしろ出てはダメだ

translation.en: [Myron] What, don't you think I can do it?
translation.ja: 誰にしろ出てはダメだ 俺じゃ ムリか？

translation.en: -[Norm] Hey, I want to go, it was my idea.
translation.ja: 僕が行く言い出したんだし

translation.en: [David] Whoa, wait, wait, just stop, okay?
Jim, right?
Myron?
You guys are... Well, you don't seem to understand,

translation.en: or you're trying real hard not to. This isn't an ordinary mist, okay?

translation.en: You open that door and something gets in here-

translation.en: Like what?
Well, like whatever made that noise I heard. Are you guys being willfully dense?

translation.en: Mr. Drayton, you know, pardon me, but I'm not convinced that you heard anything.

translation.en: I mean, we're not hearing anything now, right? Anybody?

translation.en: See?
Now, I know, I know, you're a big shot artist
translation.ja: そりゃ あんたは—— ニューヨークやハリウッドで知られた画家だろうが

translation.en: with connections in New York and Hollywood and all that,
translation.ja: ニューヨークやハリウッドで知られた画家だろうが

translation.en: but that don't make you better than anybody else, not in my book.

translation.en: Hey, I didn't say that.

translation.en: just 'cause he's got the jitters.
Fellas, it doesn't even matter about the generator, the food will keep without it.
translation.ja: 発電機が止まっても食品は無事だ

translation.en: [Jim] Kid, I'm gonna start th motor, you raise the door, and you yell out when you got enough room.
translation.ja: 発電機を動かすシャッターを開けて出ろ

translation.en: Okay, good.
Wait!
You guys are gonna let this kid risk his life over a generator that doesn't even matter?
translation.ja: 発電機のために彼を危険にさらすのか？

translation.en: Would you just shut the fuck up already?
[Ollie] Norm!
[Jim] Listen, Mr. Drayton, I tell you what.
translation.ja: ドレイトンさん　いいか

translation.en: The next time you got something to say, you count your teeth.
translation.ja: 今度 口を挟んだらぶん殴るぞ

translation.en: Because I'm sick to death of your bullshit. All right?
translation.ja: あんたの たわごとにはウンザリなんだ

translation.en: Come on, Myron.
[David] This is crazy!
[Ollie] Leave 'em be.
What am I, impugning their manhood or something?
Listen, they've lost their sense of proportion.
What's going on here?
Out there in the market they were scared and confused,
in here there's a problem they can solve. So, they're goddamn gonna solve it. [Jim] Ready, kid?
translation.ja: これは 解決できそうな問題だからだ

translation.en: Let's rock!
Norm, come on.
Don't, man.
It's a mistake.
Pussy.
Hold up!
So, any boogeyman?
translation.ja: どうだ？ブギーマンがいるか？

translation.en: [Jim] Pretty scary, ain't it, Norm?
Yeah, right.
Norm!
What the fuck?
Get it off, get it off! Get this friggin' thing off me!
Get it off! Help me, help me, help me!
translation.ja: 何とかしろ　助けてくれ！

translation.en: There's more, there's more!
Somebody help me.
Somebody help me.
What the fuck are you waiting for?
[Ollie] Hold him still! Hold him still!
translation.ja: しっかり押さえてろよ！

translation.en: [Jim] Oh, Jesus...
[Ollie] Dave, it's no good!
translation.ja: デヴィッド　もうムダだ

translation.en: [David] Start the generator!
Hey, I'm sorry.
But how the hell was I supposed to know what you meant?
translation.ja: あんたの話がよく分かってなかった

translation.en: You said you heard something.
How was I supposed to know what you meant? You should've said what you meant better.
translation.ja: もっと説明してくれたら

translation.en: I don't know, I thought maybe it was a big bird or something.
translation.ja: 俺は てっきり鳥か何かかと

translation.en: You got that kid killed.
Did you get a good look at it, huh?
translation.ja: 化け物の姿をよく見たか？

translation.en: Did you get a good look at what you did?
translation.ja: 化け物の姿をよく見たか？ お前のせいだ！

translation.en: Huh? [Ollie] David! Don't hit him anymore! -And you too! -It doesn't solve anything.
translation.ja: よせ！ 殴っても何も解決しない

translation.en: You got that kid killed, and I got his fucking blood on me!
translation.ja: お前がノームを殺し僕が血を浴びた！

translation.en: Okay, I'm done.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　もう落ち着いた

translation.en: What's next?
Kill the generator.
That's the first thing.
[Jim] I'm sorry.
Jesus Christ, oh God.
translation.ja: なぜ こんなことに…

translation.en: I'm sorry about the kid.
translation.ja: 若造のことは悪かった

translation.en: Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God.
We oughta get outta here.
Hey man, we didn't twist this on him.
Yeah, he's a fuckin' kid. He's supposed to be stupid.
translation.ja: 若いから無鉄砲なのは当然だ

translation.en: What's your excuse, huh?
Get outta here.
Go back in the market, stay by the door.
Don't say anything to anybody.
Not yet.
[Ollie] David? Need a little light here.
translation.ja: デヴィッド明かりをつけろ

translation.en: We have to tell 'em. The people in the market, we have to stop them from going outside.
translation.ja: みんなに話そうそうすれば誰も外へ出ない

translation.en: [David] They won't believe us.
They have to.
I'm not sure I believe it, I was here.
translation.ja: 僕だって信じられない

translation.en: What we saw was impossible. You know that, don't you?
translation.ja: 現実には ありえない物を見たんだよ

translation.en: I mean, what do we say?
How do we convince them?
translation.ja: どうやって彼らを説得する？

translation.en: Ollie, what the hell were those tentacles even attached to?
translation.ja: オリー　あの触手の先には何があるんだ？

translation.en: Oh my god. Are you all right? Shh, shh, shh.
translation.ja: どうしたの？ 大丈夫？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah, it's not my blood, I'm fine.
What the hell happened?
Give me a minute, okay?
I need to deal with something first.
Please, I've got to... I can't let Billy see me like this, he's scared enough.
translation.ja: 怯えてるビリーにこの姿を見られたくない

translation.en: Just give me a minute, keep him distracted. Okay?
translation.ja: そばにいてやってくれ

translation.en: Okay.
[jim] Hey, look. I'm sorry about Norm.
translation.ja: ノームのことはすまなかった

translation.en: [Ollie] Me too.
I mean, I ain't making excuses, I'm just saying.
translation.ja: 言い訳じゃない　本心だ

translation.en: Look, we need to tell people.
We don't need to say how it went down
translation.ja: 詳しい いきさつは言わないが——

translation.en: or anything like that, but we're in the deep shit here,
translation.ja: 詳しい いきさつは言わないが—— みんなに事情を知らせたい

translation.en: people need to know.
translation.ja: みんなに事情を知らせたい

translation.en: [Myron] What about the out of towners? We've got plenty of them in the store. Where do we even start?
translation.ja: 住民じゃない連中にはどう話せばいい？

translation.en: Brent Norton?
[Jim] That windbag?
He's an important attorney in New York. That fella could be on the bench one day.
translation.ja: 彼はニューヨークの一流弁護士なんだぞ

translation.en: Counts a lot for people in this town, or anywhere.
translation.ja: 彼はニューヨークの一流弁護士なんだぞ 誰もが信頼して聞くよ

translation.en: Yeah, that's right.
translation.ja: 誰もが信頼して聞くよ

translation.en: Do it quick, David.
We've gotta discuss how we're gonna stop that thing getting in here.
Wait, what do you mean getting in? You shut the loading door.
translation.ja: どういう意味だ？シャッターを閉めただろ

translation.en: Yeah, but the entire front of the store is plate glass.
translation.ja: 店の正面は すべてガラスなんだぞ

translation.en: Jesus Christ.
It ain't going very well, is it?
Come here.
Tell him.
It's true.
Tentacles.
Um, gentlemen, I'm sorry,
I'm just not that stupid.
translation.ja: 悪いが 私はバカじゃない

translation.en: I mean, what do you take me for? I'm shocked.
translation.ja: 何のマネだ？ショックだよ

translation.en: I'm shocked.
I'm shocked, it's pretty tasteless
translation.ja: 無神経すぎる この状況で私を笑い者にするとは

translation.en: using what's happening here to try to make me look like an idiot.
translation.ja: この状況で私を笑い者にするとは

translation.en: No, no, no, that's not what's going on here.
Look, come back to the loading dock, okay?
translation.ja: そんなつもりはない 倉庫へ　見せよう

translation.en: I'll show you.
Blood, and a chuck of tentacle on the floor.
translation.ja: 血痕と 触手の断片が転がってる

translation.en: No.
No, what do you mean no?
Uh, no. We've got real problems to deal with here,
translation.ja: 重大な問題を抱えているんだぞ

translation.en: and this pathetic attempt at a joke
translation.ja: 重大な問題を抱えているんだぞ くだらんジョークはいい加減にしたまえ

translation.en: has gone far enough.
translation.ja: くだらんジョークはいい加減にしたまえ

translation.en: Mr. Norton. What reason could we possibly have-
translation.ja: ノートンさんそうじゃないんです

translation.en: Oh, please, please!
This is payback for the lawsuit that I filed against him last year, and you guys are backing him up.
translation.ja: 去年 彼を訴えたから報復のつもりだな

translation.en: So, winning wasn't enough, huh? You wanted to humiliate me some more.
translation.ja: 勝訴したうえ私に恥をかかす気か

translation.en: Show me a rubber snake while these hicks
translation.ja: 勝訴したうえ私に恥をかかす気か どうせゴムの蛇だろ田舎者めが

translation.en: stand around laughing their asses off.
translation.ja: どうせゴムの蛇だろ田舎者めが

translation.en: Watch who you're calling a hick. Myron, Myron, Myron!
Mr. Norton, I swear. You've got us all wrong.
translation.ja: ノートンさん誓う　それは誤解だ

translation.en: You're not too crazy about out of towners, are ya?
translation.ja: あんたは よそ者をよく思ってないだろ

translation.en: I only spend my money and I pay my taxes here,
translation.ja: この町に税金を納める私にあんたは——

translation.en: and I've seen you talking behind my back.
translation.ja: この町に税金を納める私にあんたは—— 陰口をたたいてる

translation.en: How y'all stick together?
Well, don't I feel foolish?
I actually thought you were being kind to me today. Well, thanks for setting me straight.
translation.ja: 今日 愚かにもあんたを親切だと思った

translation.en: And I'm glad that tree fell on your boathouse, you know that? Glad.
translation.ja: ボート小屋が つぶれて最高だ

translation.en: Smashed it in pretty good, didn't it? Fantastic. Now all of y'all, just stay out of my way-
translation.ja: もう二度と会いたくない

translation.en: I know you're scared, man. I'm scared too.
translation.ja: 怖いんだろ？僕も怖いが——

translation.en: Lives are at stake around here. -David, I- -Okay, my son's life.
Now, I need you.
translation.ja: 息子を救うためにも協力が必要だ　頼む

translation.en: Brent, please, get your head out of your ass.
translation.ja: 息子を救うためにも協力が必要だ　頼む 一緒に来てくれ

translation.en: All right?
I'll drag you back there if I have to. Come here.
translation.ja: 必要なら引きずっていく

translation.en: Get your God damn hands off of me!
I'll sue your ass again! Sue your ass! And this time you'll go to jail.
translation.ja: 訴えてやる刑務所に送り込むぞ！

translation.en: This man assaulted me. He assaulted me. You were witness to it.
translation.ja: 彼に襲われた証人になってくれ

translation.en: This man's crazy, he's crazy.
No.
I wish he was, but he isn't.
translation.ja: 異常なら まだマシだ

translation.en: Everyone in the store. You want to come back here?
translation.ja: 皆さんここに集まってください

translation.en: There's something that you need to hear, it concerns you all.
translation.ja: 聞いてほしいことがあります

translation.en: [Bud] Wait, wait, wait, wait. I don't know what you people think you're doing.
translation.ja: 君たち どういうつもりだ？

translation.en: You drinking? For Christ's sake, Ollie.
translation.ja: 酒を飲んでるのか？オリー

translation.en: Do you want me to report you? You want to lose your job?
translation.ja: 報告すれば クビだぞ

translation.en: Look, I'm gonna be taking down names, starting with you.
translation.ja: 名前を書く　君から

translation.en: And I am prepared to file a police report.
Fine, Bud, write down your names. I will.
And in the meantime, shut the fuck up and listen.
translation.ja: つべこべ言わず 聞くんだ

translation.en: This is Mr. David Drayton. You need to hear what he's got to say if you're thinking about leaving. Go hang out with the ladies, all right?
translation.ja: デヴィッド･ドレイトン氏から外へ出ようとする方に話が

translation.en: Listen, don't be scared.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　怖くないよ

translation.en: Okay.
This is how it is.
Now, I don't know what this mist is,
translation.ja: 霧の正体は分からないが

translation.en: but there are things in it, and they're dangerous, like Dan said.
translation.ja: 中に危険な何かがいる

translation.en: [Dan] That's right.
That's exactly right.
[Mike] What kinda things?
I never saw it, it happened too fast. I got knocked down.
translation.ja: 一瞬の出来事で私は地面に倒された

translation.en: Five us went back in the loading dock.
It was Jim, Myron, Ollie, me,
translation.ja: ジム　マイロン　オリー

translation.en: Norm, the bag boy.
Where's Norm?
translation.ja: シャッターを開け—— 発電機の排気口を見にノームが出ようとして…

translation.en: So Norm could go out and clear the vent for the generator.
translation.ja: 発電機の排気口を見にノームが出ようとして…

translation.en: Something came out of the mist and took him.
translation.ja: 何かに さらわれた

translation.en: Took him? What do you mean?
translation.ja: さらわれた？ つまり？

translation.en: Just killed him. I mean, dragged him off.
translation.ja: 霧の中の何かに連れ去られた

translation.en: Now, guys, I don't know what these things are.
translation.ja: でも… 何なのかは分からない

translation.en: All we saw were tentacles.
Tentacles, he says.
Tentacles from Planet X.
No, it's a lie, you know. All these people do is just lie each other up.
translation.ja: ウソだ　この連中は騙そうとしている

translation.en: It's a pile of shit.
Of course it's a lie, of course it's a lie, it's lunacy!
translation.ja: ウソだ　デタラメだよ

translation.en: And from the look of it, the tentacles are coming out of the beer cans.
translation.ja: ビール缶から出た触手か？

translation.en: All right, Bud, don't take our word for it. Go look.
translation.ja: 信じないなら 見てこい

translation.en: What the hell is that?
It appears we may have a problem of some magnitude here.
translation.ja: 我々は重大な問題に直面しています

translation.en: Let me...
Help these people.
translation.ja: この人たちを助けさせてください

translation.en: Let me preach your word.
translation.ja: あなたの言葉を説かせてください

translation.en: Let me shine your light. 'Cause they're not all bad.
translation.ja: 光で導かせてください悪人ばかりではないはず

translation.en: They can't all be bad.
translation.ja: 全員が悪人ではありません

translation.en: Some can be saved, can't they?
translation.ja: 何人かは救うことができるはずです

translation.en: Yes, some can be brought to heaven's holy gates
translation.ja: そうあなたの赦しによって——

translation.en: through your grace.
translation.ja: 天国の門をくぐれるはずです

translation.en: I have to believe that, though I know most people swim
translation.ja: でも 彼らのうちの多くは——

translation.en: in a lake of fire forever.
translation.ja: 永遠に地獄の炎の中にいる

translation.en: If I can save a few, even one,
translation.ja: もし 何人か救えたら

translation.en: then my life will have counted for something.
translation.ja: 私の人生に意義が見いだせます

translation.en: I will have pulled my weight,
translation.ja: 私は役割を果たせるのです

translation.en: I will have earned my place at your side,
translation.ja: そして あなたのおそばへ行ける

translation.en: I will have served a purpose here on this earth. Hello?
translation.ja: あなたのご意思をまっとうできるのです

translation.en: What?
I just need to use the bathroom.
Okay, well then, have at it.
Ma'am, I just want you to know that it's okay,
translation.ja: ねえ 知ってほしいの

translation.en: being scared, I mean.
translation.ja: 当然のことだわ恐れるのは誰でも同じよ

translation.en: And, well, if you need a friend, you know,
translation.ja: 当然のことだわ恐れるのは誰でも同じよ 友達か 話し相手が必要な時は私が…

translation.en: someone to talk to-
translation.ja: 友達か 話し相手が必要な時は私が…

translation.en: I have a friend, God up above.
I talk to him every day.
translation.ja: 天の神様よ 毎日 話をしてる

translation.en: Don't you condescend me.
I'm sorry?
Not ever. You don't mock me.
translation.ja: この私をバカにしないことね

translation.en: That's not what I was doing.
translation.ja: そんなつもりはないわ

translation.en: Look, I tell you what. The day I need a friend like you,
translation.ja: あなたを友達にするくらいなら——

translation.en: I'll just have myself a little squat and shit one out.
translation.ja: トイレの汚物のほうがマシ

translation.en: Maybe you do believe this, maybe they're not lies, they're delusions, whatever.
translation.ja: 信じるのは自由だがウソでないなら 妄想だろう

translation.en: The fact remains the evidence here is flimsy, it's bordering on ludicrous.
translation.ja: 事実と認めるには証拠が不十分だ

translation.en: Hey, this isn't a court room.
You're not arguing a case, and you're doing nothing but damage talking the way you are.
translation.ja: みんなを混乱させるな

translation.en: And you can throw as much cow's blood around the loading dock as you want to, you still haven't fooled anyone.
translation.ja: わざと床に血をまいても誰も騙されない

translation.en: [Ollie] Leave it alone, David. You can't convince some people there's a fire even when their hair is burning.
translation.ja: ほっておけ　人の話を聞こうとしない連中だ

translation.en: Denial is a powerful thing.
Well, keep talking. I'll have no part of it, nor would any thinking person.
translation.ja: 勝手に わめいてろ知的な人間は耳を貸さない

translation.en: Keep thinking, Mr. Lawyer.
translation.ja: 知的で結構ね　弁護士さん

translation.en: There's no defense against the will of God.
translation.ja: 神のご意思には逆らえない

translation.en: There's no court of appeals in hell.
translation.ja: 地獄で上告はできない

translation.en: There's no defense here either, not even with all the fertilizer in the world.
translation.ja: 防御などムリよそんな肥料の袋ではね

translation.en: Not even if you stack it as high as you can,
it's still just bags of shit, isn't it?
translation.ja: 肥料など どうせ牛の糞よ

translation.en: Those of you who want to discuss this thing rationally
translation.ja: 救援を求める方法を考えたい方は——

translation.en: to find a means of rescue are welcome to join me.
translation.ja: 救援を求める方法を考えたい方は—— 私の元へ どうぞ

translation.en: Those who want to stack dog food, knock yourselves out.
translation.ja: ドッグフードを積みたい人は—— 好きにしてくれ

translation.en: We got those windows taped up as best we could, it should help.
translation.ja: ガラスをテープで補強した何とかなる

translation.en: Yeah, I think so.
Duct tape and dog food bags.
translation.ja: 配管テープにドッグフードの袋

translation.en: That bad?
It's not good.
There's none so blind as those who will not see.
translation.ja: 見ようとしない者ほど盲目なものはない

translation.en: Open your eyes. Let the scales fall away.
translation.ja: その目を開いて真実を悟りなさい

translation.en: This has all been written.
Revelations, chapter 15.
"And the temple was filled with smoke
translation.ja: “神殿は 神の栄光と力による煙で満たされ”

translation.en: from the glory of God, and from his power.
translation.ja: “神殿は 神の栄光と力による煙で満たされ” “７人の天使の７つの災いが終わるまで 誰も——”

translation.en: And no one could enter the temple
translation.ja: “７人の天使の７つの災いが終わるまで 誰も——”

translation.en: until the seven plagues of the seven angels
translation.ja: “７人の天使の７つの災いが終わるまで 誰も——” “神殿の中に入れなかった”

translation.en: were completed."
Well, what are you saying? What are you proposing?
translation.ja: 何が言いたい？提案があるのか？

translation.en: That we all prepare to meet our maker.
Oh, prepare to meet shit.
translation.ja: 神を迎えるため クソを迎える準備か

translation.en: Lady, your tongue must be hung in the middle so that it could waggle at both ends.
translation.ja: あんたの舌はチョロチョロよく動くよ

translation.en: No, the end time has come. Not in flames, but in mist.
translation.ja: 世の終わりが 炎ではなく霧と共に訪れる

translation.en: How about if your ass prepares to meet my size 10 work boot, how bout that?
translation.ja: ケツを蹴飛ばしてやる！準備しておけ

translation.en: Hey, there's no call for that.
translation.ja: ケツを蹴飛ばしてやる！準備しておけ 罵倒はやめて

translation.en: Yeah, Myron, please, calm your friend down.
translation.ja: 罵倒はやめて 彼を落ち着かせろ

translation.en: [Mrs. Carmody] I'm trying to save your soul, you stupid man. Doubters will doubt till the end.
translation.ja: あなたの魂を救いたいのよ

translation.en: Don't worry, Billy, it's okay.
A monstrosity did pull that poor boy away.
translation.ja: 怪物が哀れな若者をさらった

translation.en: Things in the mist. Do you doubt?
translation.ja: 霧の中にいる物を疑うの？

translation.en: Do you?
Then go out.
Go out and say "How do you do?"
Shut up, lady!
For God's sakes!
Look, you'll have to stop now, you're scaring the children.
They should be scared.
Oh yes, they should.
translation.ja: そう　怯えるべきだわ

translation.en: Their beautiful, pure little minds
translation.ja: 彼らの美しく純粋な心は——

translation.en: have been corrupted with lies, lies.
translation.ja: 多くのウソで汚されたのよ

translation.en: All this talk of a modern God, or no God.
translation.ja: 空疎な“現代の神”や—— 無神論に さらされて

translation.en: There is one God.
The God of the Israelites.
And he is a stern and vengeful God.
translation.ja: 過酷で 仕返しをする神

translation.en: And we have been mocking him far too long.
translation.ja: 我々は神を無視してきた

translation.en: And now he demands retribution and blood.
translation.ja: だから 神は償いを求めている

translation.en: It is time to declare yourselves.
translation.ja: 今こそ立場を選ぶべき時

translation.en: Take sides, the saved and the damned.
translation.ja: 救われる者か呪われる者か

translation.en: Read the Good Book, it calls for expiation, blood!
translation.ja: 聖書にあるとおりいけにえ(生贄)が必要　血よ

translation.en: What?
Blood.
Little Normie was first, and now God calls the rest of us.
translation.ja: ノームは最初の生贄神は我々の犠牲を望んでる

translation.en: The bill is due. It must be paid.
translation.ja: 神へのツケを支払わねば

translation.en: As Abraham prepared to sacrifice his only son to prove his love for God, so...
translation.ja: アブラハムが息子の命を差し出そうとしたように

translation.en: -[loud slap] -Enough.
Another down payment. A few more pennies in the jar.
translation.ja: これも支払いの一部血の一滴よ

translation.en: Now that's nice. See, I can't smack her, but it's okay for you?
translation.ja: よくやった俺がやりたいよ

translation.en: I'm sorry everybody, but this lady's perspective is a little too Old Testament for my tastes.
translation.ja: 旧約聖書じみた考えに腹が立って

translation.en: They'll come for you.
Maybe tonight when darkness comes.
translation.ja: たぶん今夜 闇と共に

translation.en: They'll come tonight. And they'll take someone else.
translation.ja: 今夜 襲いに来て誰かの命を奪う

translation.en: See if they don't.
translation.ja: 見てなさい怪物が来た時——

translation.en: And when they do, you will cry to God,
translation.ja: 見てなさい怪物が来た時—— あなたたちは神に叫び

translation.en: and you will beg Mother Carmody to show you the way.
translation.ja: この私に導きを求めるのよ

translation.en: That's fine.
Until then if you don't shut up, I'll wrap this tape around your mouth.
translation.ja: だが 黙らないならその口にテープを貼る

translation.en: You just try it, Ollie Weeks.
translation.ja: やってみなさい　オリー

translation.en: And you, bitch.
You hit me again, if you dare.
translation.ja: 今度 ひっぱたいたら

translation.en: You'll be on your knees to me before this is through.
translation.ja: 私に ひざまずいて助けを乞うはず

translation.en: Those of you who aren't locals should know
translation.ja: この町では誰もが知ってるカーモディさんは——

translation.en: that Mrs. Carmody is known in town for being unstable.
translation.ja: この町では誰もが知ってるカーモディさんは—— “変な人”だと

translation.en: What was your first clue?
translation.ja: そりゃ驚いたいつ分かったんだ？

translation.en: Sup, little dude?
How come your friends don't come get us? They got tanks and stuff, right?
translation.ja: なぜ軍が来ないの？戦車があるのに

translation.en: Why can't you just call 'em?
Phones don't work.
But don't you got like a radio?
Hey champ, what's going on?
I want their friends to come rescue us.
they're stuck here just like us.
translation.ja: 彼らも動けないんだよ

translation.en: Guys, we could use a hand over there.
Yeah, sure thing.
Troop, off your asses.
I don't like that scary lady.
Oh, man, I don't either. But you know what?
translation.ja: パパだって嫌いさでも もしかしたら——

translation.en: Maybe she's scared too.
You think?
You think Mommy's okay?
Billy...
I'm sorry about the times I was bad to her. Oh, hey.
translation.ja: ママに逆らってごめんなさい

translation.en: Mommy loves you very much,
translation.ja: ママは心からお前を愛してる

translation.en: and I bet she's fine.
And I promise you, I'm gonna do everything I can to get us back to her.
translation.ja: 約束する　何があってもママの元へ帰るからな

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay.
So we can use the charcoal fluid and the mops to make torches,
translation.ja: 液体燃料とモップでたいまつが作れる

translation.en: and we've got knives and stuff, God knows.
This may be a silly question, Bud,
translation.ja: バカげた質問だと思うが

translation.en: but do you happen to have a gun in the store?
translation.ja: バカげた質問だと思うが 店に銃は置いてるか？

translation.en: No. Please, this isn't Los Angeles.
translation.ja: まさかロサンゼルスじゃない

translation.en: I've got a shotgun in my truck.
translation.ja: まさかロサンゼルスじゃない トラックにショットガンが

translation.en: I could try for it if you want.
Oh God, I don't think that would be a good idea, Mr. Cornell.
translation.ja: それは まずいですよ

translation.en: Hold on.
This gun, uh, my husband's idea.
translation.ja: 出張の多い夫がこれを護身用にと

translation.en: He's away on business a lot. It's not even loaded.
translation.ja: 弾丸は入ってないんだけど

translation.en: Ain't much use unloaded, ma'am.
You know how to use that?
Well, I shot it once on a pistol range, hit the target a few times.
translation.ja: 射撃練習場で的を数回 撃っただけ

translation.en: So, we've got a gun.
Anybody know how to shoot it? Well, I mean?
translation.ja: ちゃんと撃てる人間はいるのか？

translation.en: I do.
You?
Ollie, please.
Some target shooting. State champion in '94.
translation.ja: 射撃は得意だ'94年 州チャンピオンだよ

translation.en: Hey, you're crazy if you go out there.
translation.ja: 射撃は得意だ'94年 州チャンピオンだよ 出てはダメだ！

translation.en: Let us pass!
Let us pass, please!
Let's just talk this thing through.
[Norton] We have, and we made our decision. We're leaving.
translation.ja: 決めたんだ　出ていく

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Mackey's gonna barbecue some chicken on the gas grill.
translation.ja: マッキーさんがチキンを焼く

translation.en: Why don't we just sit down and-
What, and let you keep on talking? No, I've been in far too many court rooms to fall for that.
translation.ja: 話を聞けと？これ以上 ムダだ

translation.en: You've already psyched out half a dozen of my people already.
Your people? What kind of talk is that? They are people, that's all.
translation.ja: あなたの陣営？偉そうな言い方ね

translation.en: Now, listen everyone.
We are experiencing some kind of disaster.
translation.ja: これは重大な災厄なんだ

translation.en: I don't know whether it's man-made or natural,
translation.ja: 人為的か 自然現象か

translation.en: but I do know that it's definitely not supernatural,
translation.ja: 人為的か 自然現象か だが 超自然的なものではない

translation.en: or Biblical. And no offense, Mrs. Carmody,
but the only way we're gonna help ourselves is to seek rescue.
translation.ja: 今 必要なのは救援を求めることだ

translation.en: We're going out.
Brent, look.
I'm not discussing this any further.
I know. I just want to ask a favor.
translation.ja: 分かってる頼みたいことが

translation.en: Tie this around your waist.
What for?
It'll let us know you got at least 300 feet.
translation.ja: 100メートルは行けたと分かる

translation.en: I'll do it.
Are you throwing in with them?
No thanks.
I think your man there's a little too tightly wound.
translation.ja: 彼は相当 気が立ってる

translation.en: Gonna get somebody killed.
I'm thinking we could use that shotgun of yours.
translation.ja: ショットガンを取ってこよう

translation.en: I saw where you parked when I pulled in.
translation.ja: あんたのトラックから

translation.en: Red pickup, right? Far entrance?
translation.ja: 奥にある 赤いのだろ？

translation.en: Son, you've got brass balls.
The shells are in the glove compartment, drive it back.
translation.ja: 弾丸はグローブボックスの中だ

translation.en: Just see they're paying out this line.
translation.ja: ロープはたるませ気味にしろ

translation.en: Line's up, I'll cut her loose.
translation.ja: ロープはたるませ気味にしろ 何かあれば切って知らせる

translation.en: Just so you understand. Yeah.
translation.ja: 何かあれば切って知らせる

translation.en: You sure there's no way I can talk you out of this?
David, there's nothing out there.
translation.ja: デヴィッド外には何もいない

translation.en: Nothing in the mist.
What if you were wrong?
Then I guess the joke would be on me after all.
We're gonna send back help.
You'll die out there, all of you.
translation.ja: 出たら死ぬわ　一人残らず

translation.en: Hey, crazy lady. I believe in God too,
translation.ja: イカれたレディ俺も神を信じるが

translation.en: I just don't think he's the bloodthirsty asshole you make him out to be.
translation.ja: 神は あんたが言うほど血に飢えてない

translation.en: Well, you take that up with the devil when you run into him. Just chat it over at your leisure.
translation.ja: 悪魔に会ったらよく考えることね

translation.en: Well, let's strike out toward the center of town.
Keep it loose.
[Jim] Nice and easy. Keep goin'.
translation.ja: いいぞ　その調子で行け

translation.en: Look.
It's goin'.
They're doing good.
Put it down!
Pull!
Back up, back up, back up!
Cut the rope!
Shut the door!
Now do you see?
translation.ja: どう？ 分かったでしょ

translation.en: Now do you believe?
About a half hour of daylight left.
Guys, how's it going with these work lights?
We're getting them rigged up, all right.
Yeah, check it out.
All right, all right, save it, save it. These batteries ain't topped up.
translation.ja: 消せ　バッテリーは充電不足なんだぞ

translation.en: If you turn the lights on, it's gonna drain them quick.
How quick?
Five minutes, maybe 10?
Yeah, if that.
Okay. Emergencies only.
If something gets in the store.
Holy Jesus, you scared the shit outta me.
Oh, Sally, I'm sorry, really.
I thought I'd come in and say hi and see how you were holding up.
translation.ja: 君が気になって大丈夫か？

translation.en: Barely, how about you?
I'm worried about my folks, I guess.
You know, they live up on Shorham Road, that's less than 5 miles from here.
translation.ja: ここから わずか数キロの所に住んでるんだ

translation.en: Oh, how about yours?
Oh, they're out of town right now. They're at my aunt's in Boston, so.
translation.ja: 今はボストンの叔母の家に行っているの

translation.en: That's lucky. That means they're okay.
translation.ja: 運がいい　無事だね

translation.en: I hope so.
How soon you shippin' out?
translation.ja: 戦地へは いつ出発するの？

translation.en: Uh, a couple weeks.
Scared about going over there?
Yeah.
Hey, Wayne? Hm? How come you never asked me out?
translation.ja: ウェイン　なぜ一度も誘ってくれなかったの？

translation.en: We flirted all through high school, I know you like me.
translation.ja: 高校の頃から気があるのに

translation.en: So, how come?
I'm stupid, I guess.
Oh, shit, I'm sorry.
Don't be, I just... I just didn't really want it to happen like this, you know?
translation.ja: こんなふうには望んでいなかったから

translation.en: Some shitty locker room at work.
Can we just stay in here a while then?
translation.ja: しばらく ここにいよう

translation.en: Okay, just you and me?
The parking lot lamps turned on.
translation.ja: 駐車場の明かりがついた

translation.en: [Ollie] They're on a timer. Must be a different one that's live.
translation.ja: タイマーだ別の電気回線だろう

translation.en: [Dan] Maybe we could tie into them somehow. Get some electricity in here.
translation.ja: 線をつなげば 店内に電気を引き込める

translation.en: That would mean walking out the door.
translation.ja: それには外へ出ないと

translation.en: David!
Look!
My God.
Bugs?
Not like any I've ever seen.
[Mrs. Carmody] "They came out of the smoke. Locusts upon the earth.
translation.ja: “煙の中からイナゴの群れが地上へ”

translation.en: And unto them was given power,
even as the scorpions of the earth have power."
translation.ja: “地上のサソリと同じ力が与えられた”

translation.en: Look at those stingers.
Dear God.
Holy shit!
Myron, get the ones in the back.
God, I think they're attracted to the light.
Look out, look out, look out!
Douse the light!
[Jim] Look out, look out!
[Mrs. Carmody] "And there come a voice from the temple, saying to the seven angels...
translation.ja: “神殿から響く声が７人の天使に言った”

translation.en: Go your ways, and pour out the vials
translation.ja: “｢さあ　行くがいい｣” “｢神の怒りを地上に そそぐのだ｣”

translation.en: of the wrath of God upon the earth."
translation.ja: “｢神の怒りを地上に そそぐのだ｣”

translation.en: Ollie, the glass is gonna give!
translation.ja: オリーガラスが割れそうだ！

translation.en: [Ollie] Oh my God, they turned on all the lights.
Light it!
Come on, come on!
Sally, look out!
Let me see, let me see sweetheart, let me see.
No, you're gonna be okay, you're gonna be okay.
Let me see, let me see. You're fine, you're gonna be okay, you're gonna be okay.
translation.ja: 心配いらない　大丈夫だ

translation.en: Gimme the lighter, for the fire!
translation.ja: 心配いらない　大丈夫だ 火をつけてくれ！

translation.en: Breathe, stay with me, Sally. Sweetheart, come on, come on.
translation.ja: 息をするんだ　呼吸しろ！

translation.en: Goddamn childproofing sons of bitches.
translation.ja: 息をするんだ　呼吸しろ！ なかなか つかない！

translation.en: Oh shit!
I can't, I'll smash the window!
Go, go!
Get down!
Ollie, you want these lights on or off?
Leave them on!
Where are the goddamn extinguishers?
Bring torches! We need torches at the window!
translation.ja: たいまつをガラスの前に！

translation.en: Down, down, lay down!
My life.
My life for you,
your will be done.
Daddy!
No!
Daddy!
-Billy! -Daddy!
Dad!
Billy, please!
[Bobby] Hurry up with the blankets!
Did we get 'em? Did we get 'em all?
translation.ja: 全部 殺したか？始末したか？

translation.en: She was right. She said that it would happen like this.
translation.ja: 彼女が言ってたとおりになったわ

translation.en: She said that they would come at night.
translation.ja: 夜 襲ってくるって

translation.en: She told us someone would die.
translation.ja: 誰かの命が奪われるって

translation.en: Mommy.
Shh, shh, shh, it's okay.
It's okay, it's just a dream.
It's just a bad dream.
I want my mommy.
I know.
I know, of course you do.
I want to go home.
Just sleep.
Everything will be better in the morning.
translation.ja: 朝には すべてがよくなる

translation.en: I think he likes you.
Well, I hate that I had to lie to him.
translation.ja: ウソをつくのが つらいわ

translation.en: You have kids?
No.
translation.ja: いいえずっと欲しかったけれど…

translation.en: I always wanted to, but things haven't been working out.
translation.ja: いいえずっと欲しかったけれど… うまくいかなくて

translation.en: Right now I'm thinking maybe that's for the best.
translation.ja: 今は いなくてよかったと思う

translation.en: I saw creatures fly into the store tonight, they shouldn't exist.
translation.ja: 今夜 見た化け物はどれも存在しないはずのもの

translation.en: I keep thinking I'm gonna wake up in a rubber room.
translation.ja: 精神科病棟で目覚めるのかしら

translation.en: You're not alone in that. We're all right there with you.
translation.ja: 君一人じゃない僕たちも一緒だ

translation.en: This isn't gonna end, is it?
translation.ja: この恐怖に終わりはないの？

translation.en: [Ollie] David.
It's Joe, he's getting worse.
translation.ja: ジョーの容体が悪化した

translation.en: Joe.
How you holdin' up, partner?
[Joe] David, is that you?
translation.ja: デヴィッド あんたか？

translation.en: Yeah, pal, how are doin'?
It's bad, he's bad.
translation.ja: よくない　かなり悪い

translation.en: I didn't know anything could hurt like this.
If you guys can't help me, you gotta end it, okay?
Ollie's got that gun, right?
translation.ja: オリーは銃を持ってる

translation.en: Right?
No, no way.
[Joe] You can't fuck with me on this, bro. Not with me like this.
translation.ja: とぼけないでくれ苦しませるな

translation.en: I'll do it.
Just give me the gun!
Please!
Joe, listen.
We're gonna work something out,
translation.ja: 必ず何か方法を見つけるから——

translation.en: I just need you to hang in a little longer, okay? Can you do that?
translation.ja: もう少し頑張ってくれ

translation.en: Stay with him, I'll be back.
Hattie, I need to go to the bathroom, will you watch Billy?
translation.ja: ハティ　トイレに行く間ビリーを見てて

translation.en: Hattie?
See anything?
The last of those bugs went away about four.
translation.ja: 巨大昆虫は４時頃飛び去った

translation.en: Dawn's coming.
What's on your mind?
It's Joe.
If we don't get him on some serious antibiotics he's gonna die of infection.
translation.ja: 抗生物質がないと死ぬ

translation.en: Plus he needs painkillers in the worst way.
All we've got here is liquor and aspirin.
translation.ja: ここには酒とアスピリンだけ

translation.en: You thinking about going to the pharmacy next door?
Irene Reppler says they've got Silvadene. You know, the stuff they use in burn wards. She knows where they keep it.
translation.ja: やけどの薬の置き場所をレプラーさんに聞いた

translation.en: Slow down. You can't actually be thinking of doing this.
translation.ja: 待てよ外に出るつもりか？

translation.en: I'm also thinking beyond that. We have to get out of here.
translation.ja: 薬を取ってきた後ここを出よう

translation.en: I mean, permanently.
Why? We've got plenty to eat.
And what happens when one of those things decides to break through this window?
translation.ja: 怪物がガラスを破って侵入したら？

translation.en: I'm talking one of the big ones, like the one that killed Norm.
Yeah, then the flaming torch idea didn't work so well, did it? We almost burned the goddamn store down.
translation.ja: たいまつでは戦えない店を燃やしそうになった

translation.en: It's Hattie.
Gently now, gently.
One, two, three!
I don't know how long she was there like that,
lying there next to us. I thought she was sleeping.
translation.ja: 横にいたのよ眠ってると思ってた

translation.en: I got my 4-wheel drive. It's out there.
translation.ja: 車がある近くに止めたんだ

translation.en: You're talking about leaving?
Well, we should hit the pharmacy first.
translation.ja: まず ジョーのため薬局へ行き——

translation.en: We gotta bring back supplies for the injured.
I mean, if we don't, Joe Eagleton's gonna die,
translation.ja: 薬を取ってくる でないと彼の命はない

translation.en: and we can't let that happen.
translation.ja: でないと彼の命はない

translation.en: But after that...
Look, my Land Cruiser can hold eight people.
I say we drive south as far as the fuel takes us and try to keep clear of this mist.
translation.ja: ガソリンの限り霧が晴れるまで南へ走る

translation.en: That's it?
That's the plan?
That's what I got.
No, you can't mean it. Not after what happened to Norton and his group. No, no, no.
translation.ja: ダメよ　ノートンたちを見たでしょ？

translation.en: Amanda, think. Norton got over 200 feet from this store,
translation.ja: 彼らは店から60メートル以上離れた

translation.en: that's how much rope played out. I'm parked half that distance from here.
translation.ja: ロープの長さで分かる僕の車は もっと近い

translation.en: But who knows how far this mist has spread. It could be the entire eastern seaboard.
translation.ja: 霧の範囲も不明よ東海岸全体かも

translation.en: Yeah, it could be the whole world for all we know, wouldn't make us any less dead, now would it?
translation.ja: 世界中かもしれない死の危険は同じだ

translation.en: We have 1 gun, how many rounds?
We got 10 left.
10 rounds, Jesus.
Okay, so 10.
Want another reason to get the hell outta here? I'll give you the best one.
translation.ja: 脱出したい一番の理由を言おう

translation.en: Her.
Mrs. Carmody.
She's our very own Jim Jones.
I'd like to leave before people start drinking the Kool-Aid.
translation.ja: みんなを扇動する前に逃げよう

translation.en: He's right. The flakier people get, the better she's gonna look.
translation.ja: 賛成だ　怯える連中は彼女に従う

translation.en: No, I don't buy that. It's obvious she's nuts. Look, a few people, maybe. But-
translation.ja: 頭が おかしいのよ彼女に従う人なんて…

translation.en: No, I count 4. She's preaching to 'em right now. By noon, she'll have 4 more.
translation.ja: すでに４人いる昼には８人になる

translation.en: By tomorrow night, when those things come back,
translation.ja: 夜 また怪物が現れれば——

translation.en: she'll have a congregation,
and then we can start worrying about
translation.ja: “信徒の群れ”になる そして 誰かを生贄にしようと言い出す

translation.en: who she's gonna sacrifice to make it all better.
translation.ja: そして 誰かを生贄にしようと言い出す

translation.en: You, Amanda? My little boy?
translation.ja: 君かもしれないそれとも息子か

translation.en: [Dan] He's right.
You don't have much faith in humanity, do you?
translation.ja: 人間を信じてないのね

translation.en: None whatsoever.
I can't accept that. People are basically good, decent.
translation.ja: それは違う人間は生まれつき善良だわ

translation.en: My God, David, we're a civilized society.
Sure, as long as the machines are working
translation.ja: ここは文明社会よ 都市が機能していればね

translation.en: and you can dial 9-1-1,
translation.ja: 都市が機能していればね

translation.en: but you take those things away, you throw people in the dark,
translation.ja: でも ひとたび闇の中に置かれ——

translation.en: you scare the shit outta them, no more rules.
translation.ja: 恐怖を抱くと人は無法状態になる

translation.en: You'll see how primitive they get.
If you scare people badly enough, you can get 'em to do anything.
translation.ja: 恐怖にさらされると人は どんなことでもする

translation.en: They'll turn to whoever promises a solution. Or whatever.
translation.ja: “解決策”を示す人物に見境もなく従ってしまう

translation.en: Ollie, please, back me up here?
translation.ja: オリー　味方になって

translation.en: I wish I could. As a species, we're fundamentally insane.
translation.ja: 人間は根本的に異常な生き物だよ

translation.en: Put more than two of us in a room, we pick sides and start dreaming up reasons to kill one another.
translation.ja: 部屋に２人以上いれば最後は殺し合うんだ

translation.en: Why'd you think we invented politics and religion?
translation.ja: だから 政治と宗教がある

translation.en: Oh, Jesus, that's just wrong.
translation.ja: その考え方は間違ってるわ

translation.en: Look, nobody has to decide anything now, okay?
translation.ja: 今 決める必要はない

translation.en: First things first, the pharmacy.
translation.ja: まずは薬局へ行ってからだ

translation.en: That'll be our test run. Okay?
translation.ja: これはトライアルだよ

translation.en: It's all right, Big Bill. I'll bring you back some comic books.
translation.ja: 心配するなコミック本を持ってくる

translation.en: I don't want them.
I want you to stay here.
I won't be gone long. It's just next door.
translation.ja: すぐ戻るよ隣の店へ行くだけだ

translation.en: You'll be safe.
Daddy, Daddy, there are things out there.
translation.ja: パパ　外には何かがいるんだよ

translation.en: Things...
Yeah. There's a lot less of them in the daytime.
translation.ja: そう　でも昼間は数が少ないんだ

translation.en: They'll wait.
They'll wait in the mist where you can't see them, and then when you go and can't get back in,
translation.ja: 霧の中で待ってて店から出た人を——

translation.en: they'll come and eat you up! Shh.
Daddy, don't go!
I'll be back.
Big Bill, I promise. I'll be back and then I'm gonna take you home.
translation.ja: 約束する　必ず戻ってお前を家に連れて帰る

translation.en: All right?
Together, we're going home.
If something happens, anything at all, you cut and run.
translation.ja: もし何かあったら逃げて戻って

translation.en: You get your ass back in here, for your boy's sake.
